I congratulate the class of 2025 at Fauquier High School.

Recognizing Rappahannock County High School Class of 2025

Mr. SUBRAMANYAM. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize and  congratulate the Rappahannock County High School class of 2025.

This year's graduating class is a remarkable group of…

…forward to seeing all that the students accomplish.

Congratulations to the John Champe High School class of 2025.             Congratulating Lightridge High School Class of 2025

Mr. SUBRAMANYAM. Mr. Speaker, congratulations to the 463 students at  Lightridge's High School class of 2025, a group that has accomplished  so much.
